Name: Lancelot Andrewes
Notes: Also named as a Scholar in the 1571 charter

Name: Sir John Bennet
Notes: Judge of the Prerogative Court of Canterbury , elected MP for the university in 1621

Name: William Bird
Notes: Dean of the Court of Arches ( appointed 1618 ) , and a former MP for the university

Name: Henry Bould
Notes: Later became a Fellow of the college ( 1623-1638 )

Name: The Chancellor or Vice-Chancellor of the university
Notes: The Chancellor at the time of the 1622 charter was William Herbert , 3rd Earl of Pembroke , and he was one of the signatories of the statutes . The Vice-Chancellor , William Piers , did not sign

Name: William Dolben
Notes: Welsh clergyman

Name: Thomas Dove
Notes: Also named as a Scholar in the 1571 charter

Name: John Higginson
Notes: Also named as a Fellow of the college in the 1571 charter

Name: Robert Johnson
Notes: Also named as a Fellow of the college in the 1571 charter

Name: Walter Jones
Notes: Matriculated as a member of the college in November 1621 , later becoming Sub-Dean of Westminster Abbey and Treasurer of Chichester Cathedral

Name: Robert Lloyd
Notes: A Fellow of the college ( 1622-1637 ) , but nothing else is known about him

Name: Hugh Madryn
Notes: Matriculated as a member of the college in December 1621 , later becoming rector of Newtown , Montgomeryshire

Name: Maurice Meyricke
Notes: Registrar of the university ( 1600-1608 ) and a Fellow of New College , Oxford

Name: Willam Parry
Notes: Matriculated as a member of the college in November 1621

Name: Theodore Price
Notes: Principal of Hart Hall , Oxford ( 1604-1622 )

Name: Thomas Prichard
Notes: A Fellow of the college since 1615 , appointed Vice-Principal in 1623

Name: William Prichard
Notes: A former student of the college ; Rector of Ewelme , Oxfordshire ( 1606-1629 )

Name: Ambrose Thelwall
Notes: Not found in the college records , but presumed to be a relative of Sir Eubule Thelwall

Name: Sir Eubule Thelwall
Notes: Master of the Court of Chancery ( appointed 1617 ) , and Principal from 1621 until his death in 1630

Name: William Thelwall
Notes: Not found in the college records , but presumed to be a relative of Sir Eubule Thelwall
